post:
Simplex Hosts is a small, simple webhosting & virtual private server provider. We provide Plesk Webhosting and Reseller Webhosting. We also provide Domain Names, KVM VPS' and OpenVZ VPS'. Dedicated servers can be requested too! All this at extremely affordable prices!

OpenVZ Plans: https://simplexhosts.com/billing/cart.php?gid=3  
Bronze: 15GB Disk Space | 512MB Ram | 1GB Burst Ram | Unmetered Bandwidth | 2 Cores | USA | 100MB/S Uplink. £2.10  
Silver: 30GB Disk Space | 1GB Ram | 2GB Burst Ram | Unmetered Bandwidth | 4 Cores | USA | 100MB/S Uplink. £3.99

KVM Plans: https://simplexhosts.com/billing/cart.php?gid=2  
Stone: 17GB Disk Space | 512MB Ram | Unmetered Bandwidth | 2 CPU Cores | USA | 100MB/S Uplink £2.50  
Bronze: 35GB Disk Space | 1GB Ram | Unmetered Bandwidth | 2 CPU Cores | USA | 100MB/S Uplink £4.75
